DOC.brief_title: Increasing Workplace Physical Activity Sedentary Office Workers
DOC.criteria: Sedentary adult use single computer workstation majority workday Work full time ( least 35 hour per week ) Must ability safely begin stand and/or walk protocol adverse side effect Musculoskeletal joint problem Severe autoimmune condition Varicose vein may cause pain Women pregnant
